meanings.definition: Moves or faces toward the west.
meanings.sent1: The sun sets in the evening as it wests slowly.
meanings.sent2: She always walks wests when heading home from school.
meanings.sent3: The cat followed the bird wests, hoping for a surprise.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed wests, carrying secrets to the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The wind whispered wests through the trees, calming the forest.

meanings.definition: The direction in which the sun sets.
meanings.sent1: Every evening, the sky glows with colors as the sun takes its wests.
meanings.sent2: The beach is the perfect spot to watch the beautiful wests.
meanings.sent3: The wests painted the sky in shades of orange and pink.
meanings.sent4: The wests kissed the ocean, creating a stunning reflection.
meanings.sent5: The wests marked the end of another day, promising a new dawn.

meanings.definition: The western part of a region or country.
meanings.sent1: The mountains in the wests are known for their breathtaking views.
meanings.sent2: Many people dream of exploring the vast lands of the wests.
meanings.sent3: The wests hold the promise of adventure and discovery.
meanings.sent4: Legends speak of treasures hidden in the heart of the wests.
meanings.sent5: The sun sets gracefully over the wests, painting the sky in hues of gold.
